trans-unit.id: Enter new todo and press Return:

trans-unit.id: Every app I found had a terrific list of features, most of which I didn't want, so I wrote my own.
trans-unit.source: Every app I found had a terrific list of features, most of which I didn't want, so I wrote my own.
trans-unit.target: Every app I found had a terrific list of features, most of which I didn't want, so I wrote my own.

trans-unit.id: I wanted a very simple menubar app that showed a list of items that I could check off over the day. Nothing long term, just day-by-day.
trans-unit.source: I wanted a very simple menubar app that showed a list of items that I could check off over the day. Nothing long term, just day-by-day.
trans-unit.target: I wanted a very simple menubar app that showed a list of items that I could check off over the day. Nothing long term, just day-by-day.

trans-unit.id: If you'd like to contact me, I'm [@troz@mastodon.social](https://mastodon.social/@troz) on Mastodon:
trans-unit.source: If you'd like to contact me, I'm [@troz@mastodon.social](https://mastodon.social/@troz) on Mastodon:
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to contact me, I'm [@troz@mastodon.social](https://mastodon.social/@troz) on Mastodon:

trans-unit.id: There are only two settings: **Show Completed** lets you choose how to display, hide or delete the completed todos and **Launch on Login** sets whether you want the app to start automatically when you log in.
trans-unit.source: There are only two settings: **Show Completed** lets you choose how to display, hide or delete the completed todos and **Launch on Login** sets whether you want the app to start automatically when you log in.
trans-unit.target: There are only two settings: **Show Completed** lets you choose how to display, hide or delete the completed todos and **Launch on Login** sets whether you want the app to start automatically when you log in.

trans-unit.id: This app is free, but if you'd like to support it, please:
trans-unit.source: This app is free, but if you'd like to support it, please:
trans-unit.target: This app is free, but if you'd like to support it, please:

trans-unit.id: Use the **Edit Todos…** menu item to add, delete and edit your todos. Select them in the menu to mark them as complete or incomplete.
trans-unit.source: Use the **Edit Todos…** menu item to add, delete and edit your todos. Select them in the menu to mark them as complete or incomplete.
trans-unit.target: Use the **Edit Todos…** menu item to add, delete and edit your todos. Select them in the menu to mark them as complete or incomplete.
